stdout_excerpt:
Composite workflow macros (session boot, thread prep, reservation cycles, contact handshake)

Usage: am macros <COMMAND>

Commands:
  start-session           Boot a project session: ensure project, register agent, reserve files,
                          fetch inbox
  prepare-thread          Align with an existing thread: register agent, summarize thread, fetch
                          inbox
  file-reservation-cycle  Reserve files and optionally release them at the end
  contact-handshake      ...
